title: Microservice Transformation: 6-Working with an Interface Schema: gRPC
description: Learn essential princples of defining a microservice interface by running a demonstration project that's powered by gRPC
difficulty: General understanding of structured programming, git, containers, gRPC and a reading knowledge of Node.js
